This class is responsible for checking the scrolling behavior of the client.

This class is used by {@link qx.core.Environment} and should not be used directly. Please check its class comment for details how to use it.
Checks if native scroll can be used for the current mobile device.
true if the current device is capable to use native scroll.
Check if the scrollbars should be positioned on top of the content. This is true of OSX Lion when the scrollbars disappear automatically.
true if the scrollbars should be positioned on top of the content.
